channel.title: Install on internal results in boot loop
channel.description:
I have a J4125 router (the Chinese PC/OpnSense routers)
I can flash and run SmoothWAN from USB with no issues using "SmoothWAN-0.99.9HF5-PC-EFI-AMD64-DiskImage-or-WebUI.img.gz" but if i try to install on the inbuilt SSD I get a boot loop. OpenWrt installs and runs with no issues. I have tried the following to no avail.
Run SmoothWAN from USB and install on internal SSD the way SmoothWAN guide suggest SmoothWAN from USB and install on internal SSD the way OpenWRT is installed Linux LiveUSB. Installed mkusb and cloned extracted img file to internal SSD.
All three result in the same bootloops
Any help?
Cheers
